task: Create a resume and cover letter
steps: Open Microsoft Word.
Click on 'File' in the top left corner.
Select 'New' from the dropdown menu.
Choose 'Blank Document' to start with a blank page.
Click on 'File' again and select 'Save As'.
Enter a name for your resume and cover letter document.
Choose a location to save the document.
Click 'Save' to save the document.
Start creating your resume and cover letter content.
Format the document as needed, including headings, paragraphs, and bullet points.
Add your personal information, such as name, contact details, and address.
Include a professional summary or objective statement at the beginning.
List your education history, including degrees, institutions, and dates.
Highlight your work experience, including job titles, companies, and dates.
Describe your key responsibilities and achievements for each job.
Include any relevant skills, certifications, or awards.
Tailor your resume and cover letter to the specific job you're applying for.
Proofread and edit your document for any errors or typos.
Save your changes regularly as you work on your resume and cover letter.
Review the final document and make any necessary adjustments.
Once you're satisfied, save the document one last time.
Congratulations! You have successfully created your resume and cover letter.
